description: Explore a GitHub repository's wiki to discover topics and read pages effortlessly. Quickly surface the right docs and context without manual digging. Ask focused questions about a repo and get clear answers grounded in its documentation.

capabilities.name: read_wiki_structure
capabilities.description: Get a list of documentation topics for a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: read_wiki_contents
capabilities.description: View documentation about a GitHub repository

capabilities.name: ask_question
capabilities.description: Ask any question about a GitHub repository
